00102 GUIDialog_AboutSUMO::GUIDialog_AboutSUMO(FXWindow* parent,  const char* name, int x, int y)
00103     : FXDialogBox(parent, name, DECOR_CLOSE | DECOR_TITLE, x, y, 0, 0) {
00104     FXVerticalFrame* f1 = new FXVerticalFrame(this, LAYOUT_TOP | FRAME_NONE | LAYOUT_FILL_X, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1);
00105     // build icons
00106     FXHorizontalFrame* f2 = new FXHorizontalFrame(f1, LAYOUT_TOP | LAYOUT_CENTER_X | FRAME_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1);
00107     myDLRIcon = new FXXPMIcon(getApp(), dlr_icon);
00108     new FXButton(f2, "\tDLR\t.", myDLRIcon, 0, 0, LAYOUT_CENTER_Y | TEXT_OVER_ICON, 5, 0, 40 + 5, 0,  0, 0, 0, 0);
00109     // "SUMO <VERSION>"
00110     FXVerticalFrame* f4 = new FXVerticalFrame(f2, FRAME_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0,   20, 0, 0, 0);
00111     myHeadlineFont = new FXFont(getApp(), "Arial", 18, FXFont::Bold);
00112 
00113     FXLabel *l = new FXLabel(f4, (FXString)"HIB ADAPTED TRAFFIC SIMULATOR", 0,
00114     LAYOUT_CENTER_Y|LAYOUT_CENTER_X|JUSTIFY_CENTER_X|LABEL_NORMAL,
00115     0,0,0,0, 0,0,0,0);
00116     l->setFont(myHeadlineFont);
00117     new FXLabel(f4, "Simulation of Urban MObility", 0, LAYOUT_CENTER_Y | LAYOUT_CENTER_X | JUSTIFY_CENTER_X | LABEL_NORMAL, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
00118     //
00119     // additional infos
00120     FXVerticalFrame* f3 = new FXVerticalFrame(f1, FRAME_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
00121     // copyright notice
00122     new FXLabel(f3, "A microscopic, multi-modal, open source", 0, LABEL_NORMAL, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
00123     new FXLabel(f3, "road traffic simulation.", 0, LABEL_NORMAL, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
00124     new FXLabel(f3, "Copyright (C) 2001-2012 DLR / Institute of Transportation Systems", 0, LAYOUT_CENTER_X | JUSTIFY_CENTER_X | LABEL_NORMAL, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
00125 
00126     FXLinkLabel* link = new FXLinkLabel(f3, "http://sumo.sourceforge.net", 0, LAYOUT_CENTER_X | JUSTIFY_CENTER_X | LABEL_NORMAL, 0, 0, 0, 0, 5, 5, 5, 5);
00127     link->setTipText("http://sumo.sourceforge.net");
00128     // ok-button
00129     new FXButton(f1, "OK\t\t", 0, this, ID_ACCEPT, LAYOUT_FIX_WIDTH | LAYOUT_CENTER_X | JUSTIFY_CENTER_X | FRAME_THICK | FRAME_RAISED, 0, 0, 50, 30);
00130     setIcon(GUIIconSubSys::getIcon(ICON_APP));
00131 }
00132 
00133 
00134 void
00135 GUIDialog_AboutSUMO::create() {
00136     FXDialogBox::create();
00137     myDLRIcon->create();
00138 }
00139 
00140 
00141 GUIDialog_AboutSUMO::~GUIDialog_AboutSUMO() {
00142     delete myDLRIcon;
00143     delete myHeadlineFont;
00144 }
